content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-0.5, -9.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 23.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(0, 0) and a furnace at position(0, 0)
- Burner mining drill at position(5, 5) and a furnace at position(5, 5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position(y1) to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that there are no obstructions in the path when attempting to connect pipes. Check for any entities that may block the connection.

### Errors when using electric connections
- Verify that all electric poles are properly placed and connected to the electric network before attempting to power any entities. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target tile.

### Errors related to fluid connections
- Make sure that the offshore pump has a valid fluid connection and that there are no blockages in the fluid system. Check the status of connected pipes and ensure they are not empty.
